summary: why is nobody talking about this

description: I liked this format, loved the chain supply nodes (once I understood them). A bit more information would be nice, but I'm sure thats part of the upcoming game. I did have a bit of an issue with getting the paths down even after cleaning up the area, but I managed to make it work. I would love to see nodes expand when there are more than one road connecting it, like the branches on a tree leading to a trunk. The gameplay is fun and engaging without being too needy, and the controls, while basic, fill the need handily and can be easily expanded.
summary: LIke the game, can't wait to see the Beta!

description: like age of empire, the quality is good

summary: I try to install but after 2 times it intalled

description: but who can i buy it??

I downloaded fine, the game runs fine in demo mode. I eventually got good enough to find and capture 2 npc kingdoms, and found no others. I can't save in demo mode and I don't get to make bows, grow wheat, grind wheat into flour, and make bread. The game seems to cost $10 for a key to get all that, but no updates have been made or posted for a year. Does anyone know if this is still active at all? I'd buy it for what it is, but don't want to pay without getting it. It has a fair tutorial mode, but no instructions, so I rate it at 3 stars because it plays well in demo mode with fair enough graphics. I eventually ran out of ability to make roads and expand to cover the existing land and no announcement is made saying I abolished all enemies and "won".

The very last sentence mentions a "free demo" but fails to state clearly that you have to pay for the game if you want to do anything more than play the tutorial. In order to do unlock the rest of the game you need to buy an activation code. Despite the nice graphics quite an attitude for alpha software.

Die Beschreibung erwähnt am Ende das "kostenlose Demo", aber verschweigt das man für dieses Spiel einen Aktivierungscode kaufen muss, wenn man mehr will als nur das Tutorial zu spielen. Für eine Alphaversion ein recht forsches Auftreten, trotz der schönen Graphik.
Da error y no inicia el juego, del menú pasa a la pantalla de carga y allí se queda.
Acabo de instalarlo y no abre el juego.
J'ai essayé le tutoriel, car le jeu est payant. Si mon ordinateur n'était pas aussi lent je l'aurais sûrement acheté.
summary: Génial, Si vous n'avez pas un PC trop lent

description: Le jeu est payant, mais on peut tout de fois jouer en demo
summary: Bonne si vous avez un PC assez performant

description:
похожа на мою любимую игру serfcity, которую долго искал. Но установить не удалось. Процесс установки закончился, в менюшке не появилась, а при запуске в терминале выдал: "Warning: GTK2 does not support Wayland!"
Жаль.
